title: House for Sale in Colombo 6
details:
* House For Sale in Colombo 6
* Located in W.A.Silva Mawatha
* 4 Bedrooms and 1 Washroom and a toilet
* Living area
* Small space available in the back side of the house (Common for all the houses)
* 25 feet road frontage
* 400 meters to Galle road
* Easy access to all the roads
* Very Close to schools , Banks , Supermarkets , hospital and other amenities
* 40 Million (Negotiable price)
